conformance.rmi

Class ThreadTest.TestSkeleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • rmi.Skeleton<TestInterface>
      • conformance.rmi.ThreadTest.TestSkeleton
  • Enclosing class:
    ThreadTest

    private class ThreadTest.TestSkeleton
extends Skeleton<TestInterface>
    Test skeleton class that fails the test when an exception is received in one of the skeleton's threads.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThreadTest.TestSkeleton()
      Creates a TestSkeleton with a new server object.

        protected void stopped(Throwable cause)
        Wakes any threads blocked in the server.
        Overrides:
        stopped in class Skeleton<TestInterface>
        Parameters:
        cause - The exception that stopped the skeleton, or null if the skeleton stopped normally.

      • listen_error

        protected boolean listen_error(Exception e)
        Fails the test upon an error in the listening thread.
        Overrides:
        listen_error in class Skeleton<TestInterface>
        Parameters:
        e - The exception that occurred.
        Returns:
        true if the server is to resume accepting connections, false if the server is to shut down.
